io.straas.android.sdk.streaming

Class StreamManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamManager

  • public class StreamManager
extends Object
    StreamManager is used to manage a rtmp client for StraaS.

    To construct a StreamManager, you have to call use initialize(io.straas.android.sdk.base.interfaces.OnResultListener<io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamManager, io.straas.android.sdk.base.credential.CredentialFailReason>) to get your result. This method will check your developer credential, if it passed, you will get a StreamManager. Then, you can use methods in StreamManager to start live streaming.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  StreamManager.StreamState
      Show state of StreamManager.

      Fields

      The state StreamManager is trying to create a live event or establish rtmp connection.

      The state StreamManager is trying to disconnect.
      static int STATE_IDLE
      The initial state or the state after destroy()
      static int STATE_PREPARED
      The state after prepare(io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamConfig, android.view.TextureView, io.straas.android.sdk.base.interfaces.OnResultListener<io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.CameraController, io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.error.PrepareError>) finishes successfully.
      static int STATE_PREPARING
      The state StreamManager is executing StreamManager.
      static int STATE_STREAMING
      The state StreamManager is streaming.

      • STATE_PREPARED

        public static final int STATE_PREPARED
        The state after prepare(io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamConfig, android.view.TextureView, io.straas.android.sdk.base.interfaces.OnResultListener<io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.CameraController, io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.error.PrepareError>) finishes successfully. You can start streaming by invoking startStreaming(io.straas.android.sdk.base.identity.Identity, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean) in this state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public static void initialize(OnResultListener<StreamManager,CredentialFailReason> callback)
        Deprecated. Use initialize() instead.
        Constructs a StreamManager if you are a authorized developer. If check passes, developer will get a StreamManager. If not, developer will receive a CredentialFailReason.
        Parameters:
        callback - Receives the initialization result. See OnResultListener.

      • initialize

        public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<StreamManager> initialize()

      • prepare

        @Deprecated
public void prepare(StreamConfig config,
                                TextureView preview,
                                OnResultListener<CameraController,PrepareError> callback)
        Deprecated. Use prepare(StreamConfig, TextureView) instead.
        Initializes camera, codec, microphone, you will be able to preview the live video after prepare success.

        This method should only be called when the StreamManager status is STATE_IDLE or STATE_PREPARED.
        Parameters:
        config - provides information of stream, see StreamConfig
        preview - TextureView to preview video
        callback - see OnResultListener. You will get a CameraController if prepare successes or a PrepareError if prepare fails.

      • prepare

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<CameraController> prepare(StreamConfig config,
                                                                   TextureView preview)
        Initializes camera, codec, microphone, you will be able to preview the live video after prepare success.

        This method should only be called when the StreamManager status is STATE_IDLE or STATE_PREPARED.
        Parameters:
        config - provides information of stream, see StreamConfig
        preview - TextureView to preview video
        Returns:
        If the Task is completed but not succeeded, You may get error cause in Task.getException().

      • setFilter

        public boolean setFilter(@Nullable
                         BaseImageFilter filter)
        Sets filter for video.

        This method should only be called when the getStreamState() >= STATE_PREPARED
        Parameters:
        filter - see BaseImageFilter. Set this to null to disable filter.
        Returns:
        true if operation successes

      • startStreaming

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<String> startStreaming(@NonNull
                                                                Identity identity,
                                                                String title,
                                                                String synopsis,
                                                                boolean listed,
                                                                boolean reuseLiveEvent)
        Starts to streaming as the provided identity. This method will create a live event owned by provided identity and start to stream. You can provide some information for live event here.

        This method should only be called when the StreamManager status is STATE_PREPARED.
        Parameters:
        identity - live event host, this shouldn't be a guest or null
        title - live event title
        synopsis - live event title
        listed - should the live event be listed
        reuseLiveEvent - true if you want to reuse last not-ended event, false otherwise. When this be set to true and there is no not-ended event, this method will create a new event. When this be set to false and there is a not-ended event, you will receive StreamError.LIVE_COUNT_LIMIT and not-end live event id in EventListener.onError(StreamError, String), then you can use cleanLiveEvent(String, OnResultListener) to remove this event to continue or set reuseLiveEvent to true and connect again to reuse this live event.

      • startStreaming

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<String> startStreaming(@NonNull
                                                                Identity identity,
                                                                String title,
                                                                String synopsis,
                                                                boolean listed,
                                                                boolean reuseLiveEvent,
                                                                @NonNull
                                                                EventListener... listeners)
        Starts to streaming as the provided identity. This method will create a live event owned by provided identity and start to stream. You can provide some information for live event here.

        This method should only be called when the StreamManager status is STATE_PREPARED.
        Parameters:
        identity - live event host, this shouldn't be a guest or null
        title - live event title
        synopsis - live event title
        listed - should the live event be listed
        reuseLiveEvent - true if you want to reuse last not ended event, false otherwise. When this be set to true and there is no not ended event, this method will create a new event. When this be set to false and there is a not ended event, you will receive StreamError.LIVE_COUNT_LIMIT and not end live event id in EventListener.onError(StreamError, String), then you can use cleanLiveEvent(String, OnResultListener) to remove this event to continue or set reuseLiveEvent to true and connect again to reuse this live event.
        reuseLiveEvent - Listens result of connection and other events. See EventListener.

        Note: Provide one or more EventListener via this method will override all previous EventListener added through addEventListener(EventListener) or addAllEventListener(EventListener...)

      • addEventListener

        public boolean addEventListener(EventListener listener)
        Parameters:
        listener - Listens result of connection and other events. See EventListener.
        Returns:
        return true if listener add successfully

      • addAllEventListener

        public void addAllEventListener(EventListener... listeners)
        Parameters:
        listeners - Listens result of connection and other events. See EventListener.

      • removeEventListener

        public boolean removeEventListener(EventListener listener)
        Parameters:
        listener - Remove listener which doesn't want to receive future event. See EventListener.
        Returns:
        return true if listener remove successfully

      • removeAllEventListener

        public void removeAllEventListener()
        Remove all event listener, no one could receive future event. See EventListener.

      • stopStreaming

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> stopStreaming()
        Stops the operation doing in startStreaming(io.straas.android.sdk.base.identity.Identity, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean), that is connecting and streaming. EventListener.onFinished(boolean) will be invoked if operation successes.

        This method should only be called when the StreamManager status is STATE_CONNECTING or STATE_STREAMING.

      • destroy

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> destroy()
        Destroy StreamManager. This method will do operation in stopStreaming() and release resources generated at prepare(io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamConfig, android.view.TextureView, io.straas.android.sdk.base.interfaces.OnResultListener<io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.CameraController, io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.error.PrepareError>).

      • cleanLiveEvent

        @Deprecated
public void cleanLiveEvent(@NonNull
                                       String liveId,
                                       OnResultListener<Void,StreamError> callback)
        Deprecated. Use cleanLiveEvent(String) instead.
        Sets a live event state to ended.

        This method should only be called after startStreaming(io.straas.android.sdk.base.identity.Identity, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean) to validate the user Identity.
        Parameters:
        liveId - live event id
        callback - see OnResultListener. You will receive StreamError if task fails.

      • cleanLiveEvent

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> cleanLiveEvent(@NonNull
                                                              String liveId)
        Sets a live event state to ended.

        This method should only be called after startStreaming(io.straas.android.sdk.base.identity.Identity, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean) to validate the user Identity.
        Parameters:
        liveId - live event id

        public int getStreamState()
        Gets current StreamManager state.
        Returns:
        StreamManager.StreamState
